item.title: Star-Studded Kering Foundation Dinner Raises More Than $4.5M to Combat Violence Against Women
item.description: Salma Hayek Pinault, Jessica Chastain, Demi Moore, Dakota Johnson and Colman Domingo mixed with Jeff Koons, Anna Wintour and other A-listers to raise awareness and funds for women-focused NGOs.

item.title: Despite Being Set in 2024, ‘The Morning Show’ Won’t Address Trump’s Reelection in Season 4
item.description: A time jump picks things up two years after the events of season three, but “this season ends right before the election,” EP Mimi Leder confirms.

item.title: Despite Being Set in 2024, ‘The Morning Show’ Won’t Address Trump’s Reelection in Season 4
item.description: A time jump picks things up two years after the events of season three, but “this season ends right before the election,” EP Mimi Leder confirms.
